description: This file defines the Response class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which inherits from a base Message class. The Response class provides methods to access response ID, determine if the response contains a result or error, and retrieve associated JSON objects. It appears to be part of a WebSocket JSON-RPC implementation, serving as the structure for handling responses.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message, providing accessors to response data, and distinguishing success or error states.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the response message.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result JSON object if present.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error JSON object if present.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks if the response is valid.
